summary: This mod is aimed at the people who like the whole mood of skyrim and don't want it to get spoiled and have a 'Fairytale' look, this is also V 0.02 keep that in mind. Remember please send in some screen-shots my laptop doesn't even play on highest settings!
descriptionHtml:
[size=14]v[/size][size=18]1[/size][size=22].[/size][size=26]0[/size]

[color=white]We have edited the ENB to work with FXAA to create one of the best looking mods on Skyrim. It adds a [/color][color=grey]dark gloomy look[/color][color=white], just how Skyrim should look in my opinion. I've recieved positive feedback, I've recieved negative feedback. But please remember there is a brightness bar if this isn't quite too your taste, a brightness adjustment of +2-4 is recommended [/color]

I also recommend you follow this Nvidia Optimise guide:
[url=http://www.geforce.com/Optimize/Guides/five-fast-elder-scrolls-v-skyrim-tweaks-guaranteed-to-make-your-game-look-even-better]Click me for NVIDIA enhancement tool (Works with AMD)[/url]

[img]http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/5607-1-1326669906.gif[/img]


This mod is aimed at the people who like the whole mood of skyrim and don't want it to get spoiled and have a 'Fairytale' look, this is also V 1.0 keep that in mind.

[size=32]INSTRUCTIONS![/size]

Download manually not with manager! Then copy the ENB contents right into the top Skyrim folder (NOT THE DATA) and then run with the installer for the first time as it has to reconfigure.

[size=36]Video![/size]

[youtube]OSdkIxWuupQ[/youtube]

My PC:
AMD Phenom II X4 960t
Palit Geforce GTX 570
ASUS M5A78L-M
8GB Samsung Dual-DDR3 (2x4GB)


_ _

Thanks to HeliosDoubleSix for his ENB HD6 Lighting Enhancement - Dark Nights
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4142

Boris Vorontsov for the Original Ultimate graphic enhancement
http://enbdev.com/

_ _

Good Luck graphic whores,
Craig Massie and Trevor Hamel ;)
author: Craig Massie
